query: SELECT b.id as briefing_id, b.date, COUNT(a.id) as alert_count FROM briefings b LEFT JOIN alerts a ON b.id = a.briefingId GROUP BY b.id ORDER BY b.date DESC LIMIT 5
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3a5VYbVErDuZa4y.8a23307d57cf --database 7KTL9bhP82CxKecSi9Nij2 --execute SELECT b.id as briefing_id, b.date, COUNT(a.id) as alert_count FROM briefings b LEFT JOIN alerts a ON b.id = a.briefingId GROUP BY b.id ORDER BY b.date DESC LIMIT 5
